ing: 1/2 cup pitted and chopped green olives
des: "Great tasting homemade tartar sauce for seafoods. It's packed with pickles green onions, olives and garlic. Definitely a winner."
ins: Place green onion, sweet and dill pickles, garlic, olives, mayonnaise, Worcestershire, taco sauce and lemon juice into a food processor or blender and process briefly. Do not puree. Refrigerate before serving.
